bike.description: Comfort step-thru frame design, lightweight 6061 aluminum tubing, with full-length chainguard, painted fenders and training wheels

components.description: Comfort unicrown, hi-tensile steel, 28.6 radiused blades
Alloy 36H rims with steel front and Hi-Stop coaster brake rear hubs, 14G nickel-plated spokes
Brooklyn Speedway, 20" x 2.125", black with whitewalls
Cold-forged steel, electro-plated black finish, 5 1/2" arms, 36T chainring
Comfort style platform pedal with non-slip TPE insert
Swept-back comfort design, electro-plated black finish, with safety bell
Alloy with front facing removable cap, 40mm extension x 130mm quill
Embossed & stitched vinyl cover over comfort foam
Jamis Youth Comfort with embossed vinyl and single loop springs
